sentence: On Friday, Floridas Republican Governor Ron DeSantis said that if Stacey Abrams wins Georgias upcoming gubernatorial election it could cause a cold war? between the two states.
author: Samuel Mangold-Lenett
title: Ron DeSantis says there could be a 'cold war' between Florida and Georgia if Stacey Abrams wins in 2022
